algorithm_technique: Sort buses and passengers, use two pointers to simulate boarding.
problem_summary_simple: Find the latest time you can arrive to catch a bus, considering passenger arrivals and bus capacity.
problem_summary_technical: Greedy approach using sorted arrays and two pointers to match passengers to buses, optimizing for the latest arrival time.
time_complexity: O(N log N + M log M)
key_insights: Sorting is crucial for efficiently matching passengers to buses.
The problem can be solved by simulating the bus boarding process greedily.
Carefully handle edge cases for the last bus and the latest possible arrival time.
